alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:10PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson, central Lincoln and west central Arkansas Counties through 1245 PM CDT... At 1210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cane Creek State Park, or 7 miles east of Star City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Star City... Gould... Grady... Whitefield... Woodville... Langford... Douglas... Cane Creek State Park... Little Bayou Meto Park... Nebo... Tamo... Rose Hill... Crigler... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Fresno... Reydell... Varner... Sarassa... Avery... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
